title: Viktor Evolution Bug (Evolve the same ability twice)
body: I haven't got a picture of it but when I was playing viktor in a bots match I bought the upgraded staff and mashed the w evolution which put 2 points into it, which then ment I couldn't get the q evolution. It said the staff was the max rank but on the toolbar it only said it was the second rank. Wondering if thats a bug or not.

replies.body: Why would you evolve w before q?

> [{quoted}](name=Revelations 13,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6ZrRtOzP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-26T02:38:34.783+0000)
>
> Why would you evolve w before q?

I evolved e first and then I got the fully upgraded and then I accidently double clicked w.

> [{quoted}](name=Revelations 13,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6ZrRtOzP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-26T02:38:34.783+0000)
>
> Why would you evolve w before q?


OP is bronze.
